title: i need a riot support Fastt Plss :'(
body: i need a riot support one to talk to me about somme thing realy fast and i need it now plsss help me

replies.body: I'd like to help you out, but posting a vague thread doesn't allow for much progress and can cause some delays.  Let me know if you think I can help, but you can also hit us up in a [support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)if it's a more private matter.  Let me know!
